name: ShardTrek
description:
A message...

Hi! Thanks for checking out my game. By the release of this, I've only been doing game dev for a month. Prior to this, I had only completed a Udemy C++ course for Unreal Engine 5. This is my submission to Epic Games'  2022 MegaJam! This is my first ever game and I hope you enjoy!

How To Play

Works with keyboard and mouse: WASD to move, mouse to look, and "E" to interact.

This game is packaged for...

Windows

List any content that was created before the jam. 

  • Sounds were taken from weloveindies.com. Ambient music from https://pixabay.com/sound-effects/search/ambient%20loop/
  • The foliage, campfire, and lampost was taken from https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/stylized-forest-cave
  • The character model and animations from the Unreal Learning Kit.
  • The galaxy skybox uses a texture from https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/space-skybox-backgrounds-3, but the material itself was made by me.
  • The ghost skeletal mesh is taken from https://www.yo utube.com/watch?v=H7-OI7YM2D0&ab_channel=DoryaTutorial
    , but the mesh was modified by me, and rigged by me. Animations done by me as well.
